message.content:
cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.PL

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper deals with control synthesis for linear systems, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): Although the paper does not explicitly mention machine learning, the use of model predictive control (MPC) can be seen as a form of learning from data to predict future system behavior. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The use of temporal logic specifications and mixed integer programming for control synthesis can be considered as an application of AI techniques. 
- cs.RO (Robotics): While the paper does not focus on robotics specifically, the control synthesis techniques presented can be applied to robotic systems. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages): The use of signal temporal logic (STL) as a constraint language for control synthesis can be seen as a form of programming language.
